question: The registration of the political parties by the Election Commission of India is done under__?
explanation: Section 29A of Representation of People Act, 1951 says: Registration with the Election Commission of associations and bodies as political parties. â€” (1) Any association or body of individual citizens of India calling itself a political party and intending to avail itself of the provisions of this Part shall make an application to the Election Commission for its registration as a political party for the purposes of this Act.
